History

Stepping Stones Community Resources, Inc., established in 2012 under the leadership of Dr. Jessica Newton Banks. We are located in Wilson County, Wilson, North Carolina. In addition, we have DWI Services in Wilson North Carolina.

In 2013, 2016, 2019, and again in 2023, Stepping Stones Community Resources, Inc. was awarded a CARF (Commission on Accreditation of Rehabilitation Facilities) International Three-Year Accreditation making us globally recognized for our practice of excellence.

Accreditation demonstrates a provider’s commitment to continuously improve service quality and to focus on the satisfaction of the persons served.  


 

Quality Care

We are a licensed substance abuse and behavioral/mental health treatment facility providing treatment for adolescents, women and men.

 

Dependable

We are committed to providing needed services for those who have received a DWI.

 

Personalized

We help those who want to achieve their goal of living a better life.


We have a proven history of excellent care.

Call us today at (919) 269-9300


 

Ready to talk?

Call (919) 269-9300 or request an appointment today.
